snippet: The project, with phones in Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens, is considered a way to explore the feasibility of a citywide Wi-Fi network.
abstract: The project, with phones in Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens, is considered a way to explore the feasibility of a citywide Wi-Fi network.
